title: Metro.Redux.Duology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Metro.Redux.Duology.Repack-R.G.Mechanics




Release Info:


1.Metro 2033 Redux





Release year : 2014
Genre : Action / 3D / 1st Person
Developer : 4A Games
Publisher : Deep Silver
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus | Multi10
Voice Language: Eng |Rus| Multi7
Crack : NNM



System Requirements:

Operating system : Windows 7, Windows 8 (x64 only)
Processor : Dual Core CPU (Dual Core 2.2+ GHz CPU or better)
Memory : 2 GB
Graphics card : DirectX 10, Shader Model 3 compliant graphics
cards (GeForce 8800 GT 512 MB, GeForce GTS 250, etc)
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 10
Free space on hard disk : 8.5 GB

Game information:


In 2013, the world has fallen apocalypse, almost completely destroyed
humanity and turn the Earth's surface in the poisoned pustosh.Gorstka
survivors took refuge in the depths of the Moscow underground, and
mankind was plunged into a new Middle Ages.

Came in 2033. Underground whole generation. The besieged city stations
are fighting among themselves for survival, and outside the cities
horrific mutants roam.Your name is Artem. You were born in the last
days before the earth was burned, but have grown in the ground. Before
you even do not go beyond the city limits, but the fateful event caused
you to go into a desperate journey to the center of the underground
labyrinth, to warn the survivors of hanging over them monstrous threat.

From abandoned underground dungeons under your way will bring to the
surface in the wild abandoned land, where your actions will
decide the fate of mankind.But what if the real threat - the inside?

Repack Features:

Metro 2033 Redux
Includes Update 4
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice




2.Metro: Last Light Redux






Release year : 2014
Genre : Action / 3D / 1st Person
Developer : 4A Games
Publisher : Deep Silver
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language: Eng |Rus | Multi10
Voice Language: Eng |Rus| Multi7
Crack : NNM




System Requirements:

Operating system : Windows 7, Windows 8 (x64 only)
Processor : Dual Core CPU (Dual Core 2.2+ GHz CPU or better)
Memory : 2 GB
Graphics card : DirectX 10, Shader Model 3 compliant graphics
cards (GeForce 8800 GT 512 MB, GeForce GTS 250, etc)
Sound Card : Sound device compatible with DirectX 10
Free space on hard disk : 10 GB

Game information:


In the courtyard in 2034.

Under the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow subway tunnels in the
remains of the human race fighting with death threats - internal
and external.

Mutants steal the catacombs under the desert surface and hover
in the poisoned skies.But instead, to bring together, the city
station embroiled in a struggle for absolute power and doomsday
device from army depots D6. Brewing civil war can permanently
erase humanity from the face of the Earth.

In the role of Artyom, burdened by guilt but movable hope you
hold the key to survival - a ray of hope in this dark hour ...


Repack Features:

Metro: Last Light Redux
Includes Update 4
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
